meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Melissa Leanza Craig Sallinger Sara Garnett Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6555.

td.p: Melissa Leanza, a bookkeeper from Laguna Hills, California
Craig Sallinger, a government librarian from Washington, D.C.
Sara Garnett, a graduate student of zoology originally from Okemos, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $53,402)

tr.td: HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
PRESIDENTIAL POOCHES
WITCH MOVIE?
PLACES IN TEXAS, PLUS
LINES
HEY, "BERT"
